org.apache.drill.exec.testing

Class ControlsInjectionUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.drill.exec.testing.ControlsInjectionUtil

  • public class ControlsInjectionUtil
extends Object
    Static methods for constructing exception and pause injections for testing purposes.

                                     String desc,

                                     int nFire,

        Create a single exception injection. Note this format is not directly accepted by the injection mechanism. Use the Controls to build exceptions.
